item.title: Sample shortcodes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[tabs title="Tabs element" title_header="h2" disabled="false" collapsible="false" active="1" event="click"]

[tab title="Tab 0" icon="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"]

Tab 0 content

[/tab]

[tab title="Tab 1" icon="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"]

Tab 1 content

[/tab]

[tab title="Tab 2" icon="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"]

Tab 2 content

[/tab]

[/tabs]

[tablinks]

[accordions title="Accordion element" title_header="h2" disabled="false" active="2" autoheight="false" collapsible="false"]

[accordion title="Pane 0" header="h1"]

Accordion pane 0 content

[/accordion]

[accordion title="Pane 1" header="h2"]

Accordion pane 1 content

[/accordion]

[accordion title="Pane 2" header="h3"]

Accordion pane 2 content

[/accordion]

[/accordions]

[toggles title="Toggle element" title_header="h2" speed="800" active="0,2" theme="jqueryui"]

[toggle title="Pane 0"]

Toggle pane 0 content

[/toggle]

[toggle title="Pane 1"]

Toggle pane 1 content

[/toggle]

[toggle title="Pane 2"]

Toggle pane 2 content

[/toggle]

[/toggles]

[haccordions title="Horizontal accordion element" title_header="h2" width="600" height="300" hwidth="28" activateon="click" active="0" speed="800" autoplay="false" pauseonhover="true" cyclespeed="6000" theme="jqueryui" rounded="false" enumerate="false"]

[haccordion title="Pane 0"]

Accordion pane 0 content

[/haccordion]

[haccordion title="Pane 1"]

Accordion pane 1 content

[/haccordion]

[haccordion title="Pane 2"]

Accordion pane 2 content

[/haccordion]

[/haccordions]

[tabs title="Tab with sub-tabs" title_header="h2"]

[tab title="Outer tab"]

[subtabs]

[subtab title="Sub-tab 0"]

Subtab 1

[/subtab]

[subtab title="Sub-tab 1"]

Subtab 2

[/subtab]

[subtab title="Sub-tab 2 — more"]

[subsubtabs]

[subsubtab title="Sub-sub tab 0"]

[/subsubtab]

[subsubtab title="Sub-sub-tab 1"]

[/subsubtab]

[/subsubtabs]

[/subtab]

[/subtabs]

[/tab]

[/tabs]

[accordions title="Accordion with sub-accordions" title_header="h2" active="0"]

[accordion title="Outer accordion"]

[subaccordions]

[subaccordion title="Sub-accordion 0"]

[/subaccordion]

[subaccordion title="Sub-accordion 1"]

[/subaccordion]

[subaccordion title="Sub-accordion 2 — more"]

[subsubaccordions]

[subsubaccordion title="Sub-sub-accordion 0"]

[/subsubaccordion]

[subsubaccordion title="Sub-sub-accordion 1"]

[/subsubaccordion]

[/subsubaccordions]

[/subaccordion]

[/subaccordions]

[/accordion]

[/accordions]

[toggles title="Toggle with sub-toggles" active="0"]

[toggle title="Outer toggle"]

[subtoggles]

[subtoggle title="Sub-toggle 0"]

[/subtoggle]

[subtoggle title="Sub-toggle 1"]

[/subtoggle]

[subtoggle title="Sub-toggle 2 — more"]

[subsubtoggles]

[subsubtoggle title="Sub-sub-toggle 0"]

[/subsubtoggle]

[subsubtoggle title="Sub-sub-toggle 1"]

[/subsubtoggle]

[/subsubtoggles]

[/subtoggle]

[/subtoggles]

[/toggle]

[/toggles]

[haccordions title="Horizontal accordion with sub-horizontal accordions" width="600" height="530"]

[haccordion title="Outer pane"]

[subhaccordions width="550" height="500"]

[subhaccordion title="Sub-horizontal accordion 0"]

[/subhaccordion]

[subhaccordion title="Sub-horizontal accordion 1"]

[/subhaccordion]

[subhaccordion title="Sub-horizontal accordion 2 — more"]

[subsubhaccordions width="450" height="480"]

[subsubhaccordion title="Sub-sub-horizontal accordion 0"]

[/subsubhaccordion]

[subsubhaccordion title="Sub-sub-horizontal accordion 1"]

[/subsubhaccordion]

[/subsubhaccordions]

[/subhaccordion]

[/subhaccordions]

[/haccordion]

[/haccordions]
